table_description: Information about privileges, including service details and child privileges.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The etag identifier for the privilege resource.

columns.name: isOuScopable
columns.description: Indicates whether the privilege is organizational unit scorable.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The kind of privilege resource (e.g., Privilege).

columns.name: serviceId
columns.description: The ID of the service associated with the privilege.

columns.name: serviceName
columns.description: The name of the service associated with the privilege.

columns.name: childPrivileges
columns.description: A list of child privileges associated with this privilege.
